name: From Ancient Walls to Modern Skyscrapers
description: I will pick you up you near the ancient part of the Kremlin wall nobody knows about near Kitay Gorod metro station and will take you across the ancient city center to the modern part of the city- The Moscow City or Downtown which boasts with its beautiful skyscrapers. You will see the history of the city from the times of its foundation till the modern days. The best trip to see as much as possible and to get acquanted with the history of the city in brief.
